page.title: 06NW.SHERBORNE:COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: In the rural parts of the area there is one{postal delivery}each day except Sunday. In Sherborne there are two deliveries a day. There are postal {collections}twice a day Mondays to Fridays and once on Saturdays. There are three{post-boxes}within the area. These are at O.S. refs.631173; 639176; 636193. In the rural parts the majority of houses have telephones. There are also two{public call-boxes}in the residential area of north Sherborne. They are at O.S. refs: 639176; 637174. The{local newspaper}for the area is the North Dorset edition of the Western Gazette which is printed weekly at Yeovil. The Blackmore Vale magazine is available free in the Sherborne area; the Queen Thorne Newsletter is delivered monthly to every home in the Queen Thorne parish.
